name: Dancing Stage featuring Dreams Come True
overview: Dancing Stage featuring Dreams Come True (ダンシングステージフィーチャリングドリームズカムトゥルー, Danshingu Sutēji fīcharingu Dorīmuzu Kamu Tourū) is the second Japanese Dancing Stage video game. The gameplay is similar to Dance Dance Revolution and it has songs performed by the J-Pop group, Dreams Come True.
